channel.title: CVE Feed for AVEVA -- AVEVA Vijeo Citect and CitectSCADA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AVEVA -- AVEVA Vijeo Citect and CitectSCADA

item.title: CVE-2019-10981|2024-08-04T22:40:15.636Z -- aveva -- aveva%20vijeo%20citect%20and%20citectscada
item.description: In Vijeo Citect 7.30 and 7.40, and CitectSCADA 7.30 and 7.40, a vulnerability has been identified that may allow an authenticated local user access to Citect user credentials.
